title: Kotter's 8-Step Change Model
content:
Module 8, Lesson 3: Kotter's 8-Step Change Model

The Hook

This lesson covers Kotter's 8-Step Change Model as part of the Change Management module in the Learn Management course. Mastery of this topic is essential for building a comprehensive understanding of the subject area.

The Concept

In Kotter's 8-Step Change Model, you will explore the foundational ideas, practical techniques, and real-world applications that make this area of study both relevant and actionable. Each concept has been carefully selected to build on prior knowledge and prepare you for more advanced topics.

The Illustration

Understanding Kotter's 8-Step Change Model means being able to apply these principles in professional contexts. You will encounter scenarios, case studies, and examples drawn from real industry practice, helping you translate theory into competence.

Summary

You have completed Kotter's 8-Step Change Model (Change Management, Lesson 3). Proceed to the quiz to test your understanding, then continue to the next lesson to build further expertise.
